materials.raw_text: Cs: 10 g, Ga: 20 g, P: 40 g, S: 96 g

sourcing.instructions: Cs (Cesium) - chemical supply stores, Ga (Gallium) - electronic component suppliers, P (Phosphorus) - chemical supply stores, S (Sulfur) - chemical supply stores
steps: Cs (Cesium) - chemical supply stores, Ga (Gallium) - electronic component suppliers, P (Phosphorus) - chemical supply stores, S (Sulfur) - chemical supply stores
1. Weigh out 10 g of Cs, 20 g of Ga, 40 g of P, and 96 g of S using a precise balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 10 g of Cs, 20 g of Ga, 40 g of P, and 96 g of S using a precise balance.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable crucible.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 4 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 4 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified sample from the crucible.
